Question: Patty tries to explain that the problem is not that the raincoat is too small, but that this person is too big.
Hints: This person is an avid kite-flyer, but his kites keep landing in a "Kite-Eating Tree" or suffering even worse fates.
This person is drawn with only a small curl of hair at the front of his head, and a little in the back.
This person fantasizes about a future romance with Morag, but his plans are crushed when he learns Morag had sixty other pen pals.
